title: Just need help for PERMANENTLY SUSPENDED !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
last night i was reported someone on my last game, bez that sppourt is playing very bad. 1/16 in 40mins and after that i just report him and go to sleep.
today when i try to lock in and it tolds me my account is PERMANENTLY SUSPENDED and i didn't get any email about what happen to my account.
so just what to ask is anyone know what can i do and how to unlock my account?

replies.body: Hi Mr Peng Killer, as you're now aware your account was suspended due to a chargeback that needs repayment. Please continue to follow through with the instructions in your ticket, and a support rep will assess if the account can be unbanned.
